Test 1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Fidel,
You are very welcome! I have attached a link below to my landing page that will give you information about our program for your review before we speak.
http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html
When you are ready to schedule a call please follow the link below to set up a time for us to speak on my calendar.
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Thank you and I look forward to speaking with you!
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Fidel Benitez [mailto:fidelbenitez.us@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, January 05, 2012 8:45 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners
Hi Nicollete, Thanks for your swift response. I will certainly schedule some time for next week. In the mean time and in preparation for the call, is there any information related to the specific services provided and associated costs that you can share in advance?
Many thanks Fidel Benitez (832)2794533
On Jan 5, 2012, at 7:02 PM, "Nicolette Taylor" <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Dear Fidel,
Thank you for taking the time to contact MBO Partners. My name is Nicolette Taylor, an MBO Partners Enrollment Manager, and I will reach out to you within one business day.
If you prefer, you can easily schedule a phone appointment with me by visiting https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK.
I look forward to speaking with you!
Best regards, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Enrollment Manager MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6281 f: 703.793.6070 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
